how_it_works.title: How it works
paragraphs: I'm Zoe, welcome to my portfolio!
This is a very simple site.
Some pages have buttons, and others have playing cards.
If a page has buttons, just click the one you want to go to another page.
If a page has playing cards, the interactive ones are the cream-colored ones.
Enjoy, and if you think anything could be improved, feel free to let me know!
